source_sentence: 摩尼教下部讚
translation: Saṃdhinirmocana-sūtra

source_sentence: □禮稱讚常榮樹　　眾寶莊嚴妙無比
translation: □ prostrating and praising the eternally prosperous tree of myriad treasures, adorned with incomparable beauty

source_sentence: 擢質彌綸充世界　　救葉花□□□□
一切諸佛花間出　　一切智惠菓中生
translation: all the buddha-buddha flowers that grow in between all the fruits of omniscience and wisdom

source_sentence: 能養五種光明子　　能降五種貪□□
translation: It nourishes five kinds of seeds of light and can subdue five kinds of craving.

source_sentence: 心王清淨恒警覺　　與信悟者增記念
translation: The king of mind is pure and always alert, and he increases the memory of those who believe and awaken.

source_sentence: 如有進發堅固者　　引彼令安平正路
translation: Likewise, to those who are steadfast they lead the right path.

source_sentence: 我今蒙開佛性眼　　得覩四處妙法身
translation: Having thus opened my buddha-eye, I see the universe called Sarvarūpasaṃdarśana in all its aspects.

source_sentence: 又蒙開發佛性耳　　能聽三常清淨□
translation: Furthermore, it's possible to develop the Buddha-nature of the ear and be able to hear the purity of the three constants.

source_sentence: 是故澄心禮稱讚　　除諸亂意真實言
translation: Therefore, reverence and praise belong to the bodhisattva who is free of all confusion.

source_sentence: 承前不覺造諸愆　　今時懇懺罪銷滅
translation: I now repent of all sins committed by those who are not aware of them.

source_sentence: 常榮寶樹性命海　　慈悲聽我真實啟
translation: The jeweled tree of eternal prosperity is the ocean of nature and life. Listen with compassion to my true teaching.

source_sentence: 名隨方土無量名　　伎隨方土無量伎
一切明性慈悲父　　一切被抄憐愍母
translation: the compassionate father of all beings who are enlightened, and the compassionate mother of all those who are disciplined

source_sentence: 今時救我離犲狼　　為是光明夷數□
大聖自是無盡藏　　種種珍寶皆充滿
translation: It is an inexhaustible treasury, full of all kinds of treasures.

source_sentence: 開施一切貧乏者　　各各隨心得如意
translation: He gave to all the poor, according to their wishes.

source_sentence: 大聖自是第二尊　　又是第三能譯者
translation: The Great Sage himself is the second honored one, and he's the third translator.

source_sentence: 與自清淨諸眷屬　　宣傳聖旨□□悟
translation: Together with their own pure followers, they proclaim the noble teachings of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 又是第八光明相　　作遵引者倚託者
translation: Again, the characteristic of the eighth ray of light that acts as a guide and depends on those who follow it.

source_sentence: 一切諸佛本相貇　　一切諸智心中王
translation: all buddhas' original characteristics are crude, and all the kings of cognition are in their minds

source_sentence: 諸寶嚴者真正覺　　諸善業者解脫門
translation: The jeweled adornments are the true awakening, and the liberation of good actions is the liberation gate.

source_sentence: 與抄掠者充為救　　與纏縛□能為解
translation: He is liberated from the bondage of desire, hatred, hypocrisy, and false speech.

source_sentence: 被迫迮者為寬泰　　被煩惱者作歡喜
translation: Those who are oppressed by passions become generous, and those who are affected by afflictions rejoice.

source_sentence: 慰愈一切持孝人　　再蘇一切光明性
translation: He wishes to comfort all those who uphold the holy Dharma and to revitalize all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 我今懇切求哀諸　　願離肉身毒火海
translation: I beseech you, O goddess, to extinguish the blazing fire of poisonous flesh and blood

source_sentence: 騰波沸涌無暫停　　魔竭出入吞船舫
元是魔宮羅剎國　　復是稠林籚筆澤
translation: It is the realm of Māra and the realm of Rāṣṭrapāla, but it is also made up of thickets, trees, shrubs, and brush-apples.

source_sentence: 諸惡禽獸交橫走　　蘊集毒虫及蚖蝮
translation: All the wicked birds and beasts are roamed together like a cluster of poisonous insects, worms, crows, and vipers.

source_sentence: 亦是惡業貪魔體　　復是多形卑訢期
translation: It is also the seat of evil karma and wickedness, as well as the seat of many forms.

source_sentence: 亦是暗界五重坑　　復是無明五毒院
亦是無慈三毒苗　　復是無惠五毒泉
translation: It is also the seed of the three poisons of lovelessness and the fountain of the five poisons of ignorance.

source_sentence: 上下寒熱二毒輪　　二七兩般十二殿
translation: two poisonous wheels of cold and heat at the top and bottom, two poisonous wheels at the top and two poisonous wheels at the bottom, two poisonous wheels at the top and two poisonous wheels at the bottom, two poisonous wheels at the top

source_sentence: 一切魔男及魔女　　皆從肉身生緣現
translation: All the Māra-men and all the Māra-women are born from the flesh.

source_sentence: 又是三界五趣門　　復是十方諸魔口
一切魔王之暗母　　一切惡業之根源
translation: the dark mother of all Māra kings, the source of all bad actions

source_sentence: 又是猛毒夜叉心　　復是貪魔意中念
一切魔王之甲仗　　一切犯教之毒網
translation: all the armies of Māra kings, and all the poisonous nets of infractions.

source_sentence: 能沈寶物及商人　　能翳日月光明佛
translation: He can sink precious things and merchants, and he can see the Buddha Candracchattra.

source_sentence: 一切地獄之門戶　　一切輪迴之道路
translation: all the doors of all hells and all the paths of transmigration

source_sentence: 徒搖常住涅槃王　　竟被焚燒囚永獄
今還與我作留難　　枷鎖禁縛鎮相縈
令我如狂復如醉　　遂犯三常四處身
translation: It causes me to be like a madman and like a drunken man, thus violating the three constants and four bodily rules.

source_sentence: 大地草木天星宿　　大地塵沙及細雨
translation: The great earth is covered with grass, trees, celestial stars, constellations, dust, sand and fine rain.

source_sentence: 如我所犯諸愆咎　　其數更多千萬倍
廣惠莊嚴夷數佛　　起大慈悲捨我罪
translation: of the great compassion which is consummated in relinquishing all sins;

source_sentence: 聽我如斯苦痛言　　引我離斯毒火海
願施戒香解脫水　　十二寶冠衣纓珞
translation: I pray that you will give me the fragrance of the incense of the precepts, the water of liberation, twelve-jeweled crowns, robes, and jewelry.

source_sentence: 洗我妙性離塵埃　　嚴飾淨體令端正
translation: to wash away all impurities from the body of self and make it pure;

source_sentence: 願除三冬三毒結　　及以六賊六毒風
translation: I pray to remove the three winters, the three poisonous bonds, and the six thieves with their whirlwinds.

source_sentence: 降大法春榮性地　　性樹花菓令滋茂
translation: He descended to the great Dharma spring and prospered in his native land. The natural trees, flowers, and fruit flourished there.

source_sentence: 願息火海大波濤　　暗雲暗霧諸纏蓋
translation: I pray that the great waves of the ocean of fire will be extinguished, and that dark clouds and mist will cover all the entanglements.

source_sentence: 降大法日普光輝　　令我心性恒明淨
translation: the sun of enlightenment, which shines brightly and brilliantly like a buddha-sun, illumining all living beings;

source_sentence: 願除多劫昏癡病　　及以魍魎諸魔鬼
translation: I pray that you will remove the sicknesses of ignorance and oppressive demons for many eons.

source_sentence: 降大法藥速醫治　　噤以神呪驅相離
translation: He subdues the great medicine of the Dharma and quickly cures it with a miraculous spell to expel it.

source_sentence: 我被如斯多障礙　　餘有無數諸辛苦
translation: I am often hindered by such things, and there are countless other hardships

source_sentence: 大聖鑒察自哀[弟*令]　　救我更勿諸災惱
translation: Reverend Ānanda, the holy one had pity on me and said, “O Bhaiṣajyarāja! Do not trouble me.

source_sentence: 唯願夷數降慈悲　　解我離諸魔鬼縛
現今處在火坑中　　速引令安清淨地
一切病者大醫王　　一切暗者大光輝
translation: All sickness is the great king of healing, and all darkness is great radiance.

source_sentence: 諸四散者勤集聚　　諸天心者令□□
translation: The four dispersals are diligently collected, and the gods' minds cause them to □□□□□

source_sentence: 我今以死願令蘇　　我今已暗願令照
translation: Now that I am dead, I pray to make myself alive. And now that I am in darkness, I pray to make myself illuminate.

source_sentence: 魔王散我遍十方　　引我隨形染三有
令我昏醉無知覺　　遂犯三常四處身
translation: It causes me to be drunken and ignorant, and consequently violates the three constants and four locations.

source_sentence: 無明癡愛鎮相榮　　降大法藥令瘳愈
translation: of ignorance, delusion, thirst, and attachment, subduing the great medicine of the Dharma;

source_sentence: 大聖速申慈悲手　　桉我佛性光明頂
translation: The great sage quickly extends his compassionate hand to the Buddha-nature of my buddha-nature, which shines brightly and brilliantly.

source_sentence: 一切時中恒守護　　勿令魔黨來相害
translation: always guard it at all times, so that no Māra attacks it.

source_sentence: 與我本界已前歡　　院我曠劫諸煩惱
translation: He rejoiced even as long as he had been with me in my own world, for the sake of all living beings who were saddened by the afflictions of past, present and future.

source_sentence: 盡我明性妙莊嚴　　如本未沈貪欲境
復啟清淨妙光輝　　眾寶莊嚴新淨土
translation: It also reveals the pure, marvelous radiance and splendor of myriad jewels adorning the new pure land.

source_sentence: 琉璃紺色新惠日　　照我法身淨妙國
translation: the newly enlightened sun of the lapis lazuli-colored sapphire shines on my pure and marvelous kingdom of the Dharma body

source_sentence: 大聖自是吉祥時　　普曜我等諸明性
translation: When the great sage was already an auspicious being, he universally illuminated our luminous natures.

source_sentence: 妙色世間無有比　　神通變現復如是
或現童男微妙相　　癲發五種雌魔類
translation: He may show the subtle form of a boy, or he may give rise to five kinds of female demons.

source_sentence: 或現童女端嚴身　　狂亂五種□□□
translation: Or they may show their bodies to be beautiful, with the five kinds of madness.

source_sentence: 自是明尊憐愍子　　復是明性能救父
自是諸佛最上兄　　復是智惠慈悲母
懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　滿面慈悲真實父
translation: He was deeply grieved and compassionate, sincerely enlightened, and his face was filled with compassion as his true father.

source_sentence: 願捨所造諸愆咎　　令離魔家詐親厚
translation: I entreat you, reverend, to forsake all the blameworthy sins that are committed against me and become free of the deceitful activities of Māra.

source_sentence: 無上明尊力中力　　無上甘露智中王
translation: unsurpassed insight is the middle power of the honored one, and unsurpassed amṛta-jñānôttara is the king of middling wisdom.

source_sentence: 普施眾生如意寶　　接引離斯深火海
translation: He bestows the wish-granting jewel of omniscience on all living beings, leading them away from this deep sea of fire.

source_sentence: 懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　救苦平斷無顏面
translation: He was deeply grieved and saddened, but his heart was unshakably devoted to the liberation of living beings.

source_sentence: 乞以廣敷慈悲翅　　令離能踃諸魔鳥
translation: He begs, spreading out his wing of compassion, to separate himself from all the Māras and birds that attack him.

source_sentence: 無知肉身諸眷屬　　併是幽邃坑中子
內外[墦-釆+(乞-乙+口)]塞諸魔性　　常時害我清淨體
translation: It is the essence of selflessness, which destroys all Māra-realities.

source_sentence: 一切惡獸無能比　　一切毒蛇何能類
復似秋末切風霜　　飄落善□□□□
translation: Again, it's like the end of autumn when there's no wind and frost and goodness floating down.

source_sentence: 懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　美業具智大醫王
translation: With deep compassion and pity, he sincerely enlightened the great king of doctors with knowledge of beautiful deeds.

source_sentence: 善知識者逢瘳愈　　善慈愍者遇歡樂
有礙無礙諸身性　　久已傷沈生死海
肢節四散三界中　　請聚還昇超萬有
translation: The limbs are fourfold, scattered in the three realms, invited to assembly, and returned to transcend myriad beings.

source_sentence: 更勿斷絕正法流　　更勿拋擲諸魔口
translation: Do not cut off the flow of the true Dharma, and do not cast it into the mouths of Māra.

source_sentence: 降大方便慈悲力　　請蘇普厄諸明性
translation: Through the power of compassion and benevolence, by means of which they subdue all afflictions.

source_sentence: 莫被魔軍却抄將　　莫被怨家重來殺
translation: Don't be attacked by the armies of Māra, and don't be attacked by enemies who come to kill you.

source_sentence: 以光明翅慈悲覆　　捨我雨般身性罪
translation: the sin of abandoning one’s body, which is like rain, to be covered by compassion through the wing of light;

source_sentence: 唯願降大慈悲手　　按我三種淨法身
除蕩曠劫諸纏縛　　沐浴曠劫諸塵垢
translation: He removes the bondage of untold eons and bathes in untold eons.

source_sentence: 開我法性光明眼　　無礙得覩四處身
translation: He reveals the eye of my Dharma-nature, which is unobstructed and illuminates everywhere without obstruction.

source_sentence: 無礙得覩四處身　　遂免四種多辛苦
translation: Unobstructed, he attains the four kinds of unremitting body and thus is free of the four kinds of suffering.

source_sentence: 開我法性光明耳　　無礙得聞妙法音
translation: open my ears to the light of the essence of reality, so that I may hear without obstruction the sound of the Teaching

source_sentence: 無礙得聞妙法音　　遂免方般虛妄曲
translation: Unobstructed, he hears the voice of the Dharma and avoids all false noises.

source_sentence: 開我法性光明口　　具歎三常四法身
translation: open my mouth to the light of the essence of reality and praise the three eternal and four Dharma-bodies

source_sentence: 具歎三常四法身　　遂逸渾合迷心讚
translation: It praises the three eternal and four Dharma-bodies, and it's a combination of supernormal abilities and supernormal abilities.

source_sentence: 開我法性光明手　　遍觸如如四寂身
translation: open my hand of the light of the essence of reality, pervading as many buddha-fields as there are in the four quiescent bodies

source_sentence: 遍觸如如四寂身　　遂免沈於四大厄
translation: Likewise, he entered into the four great concentrations and remained free of the four major defilements.

source_sentence: 解我多年羈絆足　　得履三常正法路
得履三常正法路　　速即到於安樂國
translation: Having thus perfected his practice of the path of the Law, he quickly reached the kingdom of peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 令我復本真如心　　清淨光明常間寂
translation: It causes me to return to my original mind of true reality, which is pure and eternally tranquil with its light.

source_sentence: 清淨光明常間寂　　永離迷妄諸顛倒
translation: pure light that is always quiescent, permanently free of delusion and confusion

source_sentence: 願我常見慈悲父　　更勿輪迴生死苦
translation: May I always see my compassionate father and never again experience the suffering of birth and death!

source_sentence: 諸根已淨心開悟　　更勿昏癡無省覺
translation: Their faculties are purified, their minds enlightened, and they no longer bewildered or confused.

source_sentence: 我今依止大聖尊　　更勿沈迷生死道
translation: Reverend Ānanda, do not be lost in the mundane whirl.

source_sentence: 速降光明慈悲手　　更勿棄擲□魔□
translation: quickly descend with the hand of compassionate light, and don't throw it away.

source_sentence: 懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　降大慈悲恒遮護
translation: He was compassionate and sympathetic to all living beings, disciplined by the great compassion.

source_sentence: 恕我曠劫諸愆咎　　如彼過去諸男女
我是大聖明羔子　　垂淚含啼訴冤屈
卒被犲狼諸猛獸　　劫我離善光明牧
translation: Suddenly, I was attacked by the wolves and beasts of prey.

source_sentence: 降大慈悲乞收採　　放入柔濡光明群
translation: He bestows great compassion, begs and collects, and puts it into the herd of gentle light.

source_sentence: 得[弟*頁]秀岳法山林　　遊行自在常無畏
translation: He had attained unimpeded freedom of movement in the foothills of the mountains and was always at ease.

source_sentence: 復是大聖明穀種　　被擲稠林荊棘中
translation: It is the seed of the holy tree of enlightenment, planted in a dense forest among thorns and bees.

source_sentence: 降大慈悲乞收採　　聚向法場光明窖
translation: He descended to the great compassionate almsbowl and collected the relics, gathering them together into a vault of light at the Dharma-seat.

source_sentence: 復是大聖蒲萄枝　　元植法薗清淨苑
卒被葛勒騰相遶　　抽我妙力令枯悴
translation: He was thus surrounded by the celestial beings and withdrew to dry up his body.

source_sentence: 復是大聖膏腴地　　被魔[卄\/(栽-木+方)]蒔五毒樹
唯希法鑺利刀鐮　　斫伐焚燒令清淨
translation: He wishes only for the Dharma to be purified by cutting, chopping, burning, and cremating with a sharp sword.

source_sentence: 其餘惡草及荊棘　　願以戒火盡除之
translation: May all the remaining unclean plants and thorns be burned away with the fire of precepts

source_sentence: 榮秀一十五種苗　　申暢一十五□□
translation: Rongxiu yields fifteen kinds of seedlings, and Shenchang yields fifteen.

source_sentence: 復是大聖新妙衣　　卒被魔塵來坌染
唯希法水洗令鮮　　得[弟*頁]法身清淨體
translation: He wishes only to wash away the water of the Dharma and make it fresh, so that he may obtain the pure body of the Dharma body.

source_sentence: 懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　眾寶莊嚴性命樹
translation: He was deeply grieved and compassionate, sincerely inspired, adorned with the jewels of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 最上無比妙醫王　　平安淨業具眾善
translation: The supreme and incomparable King of Wonderful Healing is endowed with the virtues of all good deeds.

source_sentence: 常榮寶樹性命海　　基忙堅固金剛體
translation: the jeweled tree of eternal prosperity is the ocean of nature and life, its foundations are firm and adamantine,

source_sentence: 莁幹真實無妄言　　枝條脩巨常歡喜
translation: The tree of enlightenment is true, without falsehood; its branches and leaves are great, always joyful.

source_sentence: 眾寶具足慈悲葉　　甘露常鮮不彫果
translation: The jewels are replete with the leaves of compassion, the ambrosia of immortality, and the fruit of immortality.

source_sentence: 食者永絕生死流　　香氣芬芳周世界
translation: Their food is cut off forever from the flow of birth and death, and their fragrance pervades all worlds.

source_sentence: 已具大聖冀長生　　能蘇法性常榮樹
translation: The great sage who is endowed with the long-cherished aspiration can revitalize the eternally prosperous tree of the Dharma-nature.

source_sentence: 智惠清虛恒警覺　　果是心王巧分別
translation: Wisdom and wisdom are void, but the king of mind is always awakened.

source_sentence: 懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　具智法王夷數佛
translation: With deep compassion and pity, he sincerely enlightened the buddhas of the Dharma King Kuśinagara.

source_sentence: 令我肉身恒康[弟*頁]　　令我佛性無纏污
translation: He wishes to cause my flesh and body to be always healthy, so that the buddha-nature of self is untainted.

source_sentence: 一切時中增記念　　令離能吞諸魔口
translation: At all times, he increases mindfulness so that he can be freed from the mouth of Māra who swallows it.

source_sentence: 令離能吞諸魔口　　永隔惡業貪□□
translation: He causes them to be free of the mouths of Māra who swallows and permanently stops bad actions and cravings.

source_sentence: 放入香花妙法林　　放入清淨濡羔群
translation: Putting it in the wonderful dharma-forest of fragrant flowers and putting it in the pure herd of wet lambs

source_sentence: 令我信基恒堅固　　令我得入堪褒譽
translation: It will cause my faith to be firm, and I will attain enlightenment.

source_sentence: 懇切悲嘷誠心啟　　慈父法王性命主
translation: With deep compassion and pity, he sincerely enlightened his father, the Dharma King Maitreya, the king of nature and life.

source_sentence: 能救我性離災殃　　能令淨體常歡喜
translation: It is the refuge for all living beings, because it protects them from evil and liberates them from sin.

source_sentence: 作寬泰者救苦者　　作慈悲者捨過者
translation: He who acts benevolently, relieving suffering, and compassionately discarding faults.

source_sentence: 與我明性作勸愉　　與我淨體作依止
translation: It is the seat of enlightenment, because it associates with self. It is the seat of gnosis, because it understands all things.

source_sentence: 能摧刀山及劒樹　　能降師子噤蚖蝮
translation: He can destroy mountains of swords and trees, and he can subdue lions and suppress vipers.

source_sentence: 難治之病悉能除　　難捨之恩令相離
translation: He can cure the sicknesses that are difficult to treat, and he can remove the afflictions that are difficult to relieve.

source_sentence: 我今決執法門愇　　大聖慈慜恒遮護
慇懃稱讚慈父名　　究竟珍重願如是
translation: to praise the name of your loving father, who is ultimately precious and honored like this

source_sentence: 告汝一切智人輩　　各聽活命真實言
具智法王忙儞佛　　咸皆顯現如目前
我等既蒙大聖悟　　必須捨離諸恩愛
translation: Having attained enlightenment, we must give up all love and affection.

source_sentence: 決定安心正法門　　勤求涅槃超大海
translation: Determined to concentrate on the true teaching, diligently seeking nirvāṇa and transcending the great ocean

source_sentence: 又告上相福德人　　專意勤求解脫者
努力精修勿閑暇　　速即離諸生死怕
translation: He should exert himself energetically, without laziness, in order to avoid the fear of birth and death.

source_sentence: 一切世界非常住　　一切倚託亦非真
translation: all worlds are not eternal, and all relying on anything is not true

source_sentence: 如彼磧中化城閣　　愚人奔逐喪其身
translation: It is as if a magical castle were to be built in the desert, and all the ignorant living beings therein would drive away their bodies.

source_sentence: 世界榮華及尊貴　　以少福德自在者
translation: It is the seat of worldly prosperity and honor, because it possesses little virtue.

source_sentence: 如雲涌起四山頭　　聚以風吹速散罷
translation: Like a cloud rising from the top of all the four mountains, it blows and dissipates with the wind.

source_sentence: 臭穢肉身非久住　　無常時至並破毀
translation: Their flesh and blood do not abide for long, being impermanent and disintegrating.

source_sentence: 如春花葉暫榮柯　　豈得堅窂恒青翠
translation: It's like a spring-flower leaf that temporarily grows, so how could it be resolute and eternally green?

source_sentence: 當造肉身由巧匠　　即是虛妄惡魔王
成就如斯窟宅已　　網捕明性自潛藏
translation: Having accomplished this kind of cave, the net-catcher has its own hidden treasury of insight.

source_sentence: 無恩飢火充連鎖　　殺害眾生無停住
終日食噉諸身分　　仍不免於生死苦
translation: He eats all day long, yet he is not subject to the suffering of birth and death.

source_sentence: 積聚一切諸財寶　　皆由惡業兼妄語
translation: All the stores of wealth and goods are accumulated by bad deeds combined with false speech

source_sentence: 無常之日並悉留　　仍與明性充為杻
translation: On the day of impermanence, they all remain together, yet they are incompatible with insight.

source_sentence: 先斷無明恩愛欲　　彼是一切煩惱海
translation: It is the seat of all afflictions, because it eliminates ignorance.

source_sentence: 未來緣彼受諸殃　　現世充為佛性械
translation: In the future they will suffer all kinds of misfortune, and in the present they will be the fetters of the buddha-nature.

source_sentence: 苦哉世間眾生類　　不能誠信尋正路
日夜求財不暫停　　皆為肉身貪魔主
translation: Day and night, they seek their wealth without stopping, all because they are the lords of Māra's craving for physical possessions.

source_sentence: 肉身破壞魔即出　　罪業殃及清淨性
translation: Their flesh breaks apart, and Māra comes forth.

source_sentence: 隨所生處受諸殃　　良為前身業不正
translation: Wherever he is born, all his misfortunes are due to the injustices of his past actions.

source_sentence: 愛惜肉身終須捨　　但是生者皆歸滅
translation: He cherishes the flesh but ultimately abandons it. All living beings return to its cessation

source_sentence: 一切財寶及田宅　　意欲不捨終相別
translation: all the possessions, wealth, and fields are not abandoned by wishing for their end.

source_sentence: 縱得榮華於世界　　摧心須厭生死苦
translation: Even if he were to attain prosperity in the world, his mind would be destroyed by the suffering of birth and death.

source_sentence: 捨除憍慢及非為　　專意勤修涅槃路
translation: He should abstain from arrogance and conceit, concentrate on the path of enlightenment,

source_sentence: 生時裸形死亦爾　　能多積聚非常住
translation: So it is with birth, nakedness, and death.

source_sentence: 男女妻妾嚴身具　　死後留他供別主
translation: men and women, wives, concubines, ornaments of the body, leave it to another after death to make offerings to a different owner

source_sentence: 逈獨將羞并惡業　　無常已後擔背負
translation: Likewise, it is impermanent to be ashamed of one’s evil deeds and the only one who can bear them.

source_sentence: 平等王前皆屈理　　却配輪迴生死苦
translation: before the king of equanimity, they all bend their principles and yet adapt to the suffering of transmigration through birth and death

source_sentence: 還被魔王所綰攝　　不遇善緣漸加濁
translation: They will be conquered by the lord of Māra, and without encountering good conditions they will gradually become defiled.

source_sentence: 或入地獄或焚燒　　或共諸魔囚永獄
translation: They may go to hell, or they may be burned, or they may live together with the Māras in hell.

source_sentence: 歌樂舞笑諸音樂　　喫噉百味營田宅
translation: singing, music, dancing, laughing, and various kinds of music; they partake of a hundred delicacies to make offerings to the land and houses.

source_sentence: 皆如夢見[目*交]還無　　子細思惟無倚託
translation: They are all like dreams in which one sees the absence of [eyes*Jarśana]. Their subtle thoughts have no basis.

source_sentence: 世諦暫時諸親眷　　豈殊客館而寄住
暮則眾人共止宿　　旦則分離歸本土
translation: In the evening all the monks and nuns of the assembly remained together for the duration of the night. At dawn they departed to return home.

source_sentence: 妻妾男女如債主　　皆由過去相侵害
translation: Their wives, concubines, and men are like debtors, all because they have been enemies of each other in the past.

source_sentence: 併是慈悲怨家賊　　所以意分還他力
食肉眾生身似塚　　又復不異無底坑
枉殺無數群生類　　供給三毒六賊兵
translation: to kill countless sentient beings in vain and offer the three poisons and six thieves

source_sentence: 佛性湛然閉在中　　煩惱逼迫恒受苦
translation: The buddha-nature is perfectly enlightened, free of afflictive tendencies and constantly subject to suffering.

source_sentence: 貪婬饑火及先殃　　無有一時不相煮
translation: neither thirst, nor hunger, nor fire, nor any of the previous calamities are cooked together at one time.

source_sentence: 世界漸惡恒悤迫　　上下相管無歡娛
translation: The world is gradually degenerated, constantly oppressed, and neither above nor below are there any pleasures.

source_sentence: 眾生唯加多貧苦　　富者魔驅無停住
修善之人極微少　　造惡之輩無邊畔
translation: Those who cultivate virtue are extremely few, and those who do evil have no bounds.

source_sentence: 貪婬饞魔熾燃王　　縱遇善緣却退散
對面綺言恒相競　　元無羞恥及怕懼
translation: He is neither ashamed of himself nor frightened, but always speaks courteously.

source_sentence: 於聖光明大力惠　　非分加諸虛妄語
translation: In the noble light of great power and wisdom, they don't partly add false speech.

source_sentence: 眾生多被無明覆　　不肯勤修真正路
translation: Sentient beings are often overwhelmed by ignorance and unable to follow the true path.

source_sentence: 謗佛毀法慢真僧　　唯加損害不相護
translation: They slander the Buddha, disparage the Dharma, and are disrespectful to the Sangha. They only harm others and do not protect one another.

source_sentence: 汝等智人細觀察　　大界小界作由誰
建立之時緣何造　　損益二條須了知
translation: What are the reasons for establishing it? The two aspects of gain and loss should be known.

source_sentence: 一切有情諸形類　　世界成敗安置處
translation: all sentient beings, forms and types of worlds, the place where they are established and disintegrate

source_sentence: 如此並是祕密事　　究竟萬物歸何所
translation: What is the ultimate nature of all things?

source_sentence: 善業忙儞具開揚　　顯說一切諸性相
translation: all the characteristics of virtuous deeds are explained in terms of their various natures;

source_sentence: 汝等尋求解脫者　　應須覺了諦思量
布施持齋勤讀誦　　用智分別受淨戒
translation: He practiced generosity, maintained purity, and recited the precepts with discernment of wisdom.

source_sentence: 憐愍怕懼好軌儀　　依因此力免災隘
translation: Being compassionate and fearless, they show kindness to those who are helpless.

source_sentence: 踊躍堅窂於正法　　勤修智惠如法住
translation: They are firmly established in the true Dharma, And they abide on the basis of wisdom.

source_sentence: 共捨一切惡軌儀　　決定安心解脫處
translation: Together, they abandon all bad behavior and determine to rest in the place of liberation.

source_sentence: 寧今自在為性故　　能捨一切愛欲習
translation: It is the seat of equanimity, because it rejects all passions.

source_sentence: 無常忽至來相逼　　臨時懊惱悔何及
translation: When impermanent things suddenly come together, how can they be temporarily distressed or repented of?

source_sentence: 子細尋思世間下　　無有一事堪憑在
親戚男女及妻妾　　無常之日不相替
translation: Their relatives, men, women, wives, and concubines do not change on the impermanent day.

source_sentence: 唯有雨般善惡業　　隨彼佛性將行坐
一切榮華珍玩具　　無常之日皆須捨
translation: All the precious toys, flowers, and jewels must be discarded on the impermanent day

source_sentence: 智者覺察預前修　　不被魔王生死侵
能捨恩愛諸榮樂　　即免三毒五欲沈
translation: He is free of the three poisons and afflictions, but he does not rely on them.

source_sentence: 普願齊心登正路　　速獲涅槃淨國土
translation: and, wishing to follow the right path with equanimity, they quickly attain nirvana in their pure land.

source_sentence: 七厄四苦彼元無　　是故名為常樂□
translation: The seven troubles and four sufferings are originally nonexistent, so they're therefore called eternal bliss.

source_sentence: 普啟一切諸明使　　及以神通清淨眾
translation: He revealed to all the messengers of enlightenment, as well as to the pure beings who possessed superknowledgements.

source_sentence: 各乞慜念慈悲力　　捨我一切諸愆咎
上啟明界常明主　　并及寬弘五種大
translation: The above-mentioned enlightenment is the eternally illuminating lord of the realm of eternalism, along with the five kinds of vastness and greatness.

source_sentence: 十二常住寶光王　　無數世界諸國土
translation: twelve eternally abiding jeweled kings of light, countless worlds and lands

source_sentence: 又啟奇特妙香空　　光明暉輝清淨相
translation: It also reveals the marvelous fragrance of space, its shining radiance, and its pure appearance.

source_sentence: 金剛寶地元堪譽　　五種覺意莊嚴者
translation: Vajra-jeweled earth is originally praised as adorned with five kinds of enlightenment

source_sentence: 復啟初化顯現尊　　具相法身諸佛母
與彼常勝先意父　　及以五明歡喜子
translation: He's always superior to his former father, and he's the joyful son with five insights.

source_sentence: 又啟樂明第二使　　及與尊重造新相
translation: Also, the second messenger of enlightenment and the new characteristics created by honoring him

source_sentence: 雄猛自在淨法風　　并及五等驍健子
translation: heroic, unimpeded pure dharma-wind and the five equally courageous sons

source_sentence: 復啟道師三丈夫　　自是第二尊廣大
夷數與彼電光明　　并及湛然大相柱
translation: They will be accompanied by the light of that great flame, and they will be joined by the pillar of the blazing arrays of their marks.

source_sentence: 又啟日月光明宮　　三世諸佛安置處
translation: He also opened the Sahā universe of the sun and moon, the abode of the buddhas of the three times.

source_sentence: 七及十二大船主　　并餘一切光明眾
translation: seven, twelve great shipowners and all the other multitudes of lights

source_sentence: 復啟十二微妙時　　吉祥清淨光明體
translation: Again, when the twelve subtle moments are revealed, the auspicious and pure body of light

source_sentence: 每現化男化女身　　殊特端嚴無有比
translation: He manifested the form of a male or female incarnation, incomparably beautiful and incomparable.

source_sentence: 又啟五等光明佛　　水火明力微妙風
translation: Also, to inspire the five equally illuminating buddhas: water, fire, light, and subtle wind.

source_sentence: 并及淨氣柔和性　　並是明尊力中力
復啟富饒持世主　　雄猛自在十天王
translation: He also revealed to Pūrvavideha, the lord of the world, the sovereign ruler of the ten heavenly kings.

source_sentence: 勇健大力降魔使　　忍辱地藏與催明
translation: heroic and powerful, the messenger of the conquest of Māra, the store of forbearance in the earth and the brightness of enlightenment

source_sentence: 又啟閻默善思惟　　即是夷數慈悲想
真實斷事平等王　　并及五明清淨眾
translation: The king of the equality of true and real elimination of phenomena, together with the pure congregation of the five insights

source_sentence: 復啟特勝花冠者　　吉祥清淨通傳信
translation: Furthermore, it's revealed that the crown of extraordinary flowers is an auspicious and pure transmission of faith.

source_sentence: 最初生化諸佛相　　及與三世慈父等
translation: the characteristics of the first-generation buddhas and their compassionate fathers of the three times

source_sentence: 又啟喚應警覺聲　　并及四分明兄弟
translation: He also called out in response to the sound of the bell, along with the four limbs of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 三衣三輪大施主　　及與命身卉木子
translation: The three-robed, three-wheeled great donor and the life body of a bodhisattva are given to him as flowers and wood

source_sentence: 復啟四十大力使　　并七堅固莊嚴柱
translation: He also revealed the forty great messengers of enlightenment and the seven indestructible adorned pillars.

source_sentence: 一一天界自扶持　　各各盡現降魔相
translation: Each of the worlds is supported by a single being, each one manifesting the sign of conquering Māra.

source_sentence: 又啟普遍忙儞尊　　閻默惠明警覺日
translation: On the thirty-seventh day, on the twenty-eighth day of the month, the Licchavi Vimalakīrti prayed to the Tathāgata Jambudvīpa:

source_sentence: 從彼大明至此界　　敷楊正法救善子
translation: From that great luminosity, he reaches this world and spreads out the Yang Zhengfa zhi zuishengzi

source_sentence: 詮柬十二大慕闍　　七十有二拂多誕
translation: Śākyamuni's twelve great precepts and seventy-two buddha-births

source_sentence: 法堂住處承教人　　清淨善眾并聽者
translation: He lived in the house of the Sahā universe Abhirati, serving all the disciples and bodhisattvas therein.

source_sentence: 又詮新人十二體　　十二光王及惠明
translation: It also explains that the twelve bodies of the newcomers, the twelve kings of light and wisdom

source_sentence: 具足善法五淨戒　　五種智惠五重院
translation: full of the five pure precepts of the good dharma, five kinds of wisdom and five monasteries

source_sentence: 一切諸佛常勝衣　　即是救苦新夷數
其四清淨解脫風　　真實大法證明者
translation: Their four pure liberations are like the wind of unexcelled, perfect enlightenment

source_sentence: 又啟善法群中相　　上下內外為依止
translation: It is the seat of all virtuous deeds, superior, inferior, and inferior.

source_sentence: 詮柬一切本相貌　　上中下界無不遍
translation: He explains that all the original forms are found everywhere in the higher, middle, and lower realms.

source_sentence: 復告窴空一切眾　　大力敬信尊神輩
translation: Again, Ānanda, all living beings in the great city of Vaiśālī should revere and believe in this holy man.

source_sentence: 及諸天界諸天子　　護持清淨正法者
translation: and the gods of the celestial realm who preserve the pure Dharma.

source_sentence: 又啟善業尊道師　　是三明使真相貌
自救一切常勝子　　及以堅持真實者
translation: He himself saves all the eternally victorious sons and those who hold fast to reality.

source_sentence: 復啟光明解脫性　　一切時中無盡藏
translation: It also reveals the inexhaustible store of light and liberation, which is present at all times.

source_sentence: 及彼最後勝先意　　并餘福德諸明性
translation: and their final superiority to the prior intention, along with the other merits of insight

source_sentence: 我今諦信新明界　　及與於中常住者
translation: I now truly believe in the newly illuminated realm of self and those who abide therein.

source_sentence: 唯願各降慈悲力　　蔭覆我等恒觀察
我今專心求諸聖　　速與具足真實願
translation: I now concentrate my mind on seeking the holy ones, and quickly grant them my true vow.

source_sentence: 解我得離眾災殃　　一切罪障俱銷滅
translation: He understands the self and attains freedom from all evils, completely eliminating all sins.

source_sentence: 敬禮清淨微妙風　　本是明尊心中智
恒於四處光明宮　　遊行住止常自在
translation: He dwelled always in the four quarters of the universe Sarvagandhasugandhā.

source_sentence: 清淨光明大力惠　　我今至心普稱歎
translation: I now wholeheartedly praise it universally.

source_sentence: 慈父明子淨法風　　并及一切善法相
一切光明諸佛等　　各願慈悲受我請
與我離苦解脫門　　令我速到常明界
又歎善業修道眾　　過去未來現在者
translation: He also praised the holy ones who had done good deeds and were engaged in religious practice.

source_sentence: 各開清淨甘露口　　吐大慈音捨我罪
translation: each opening his mouth with a pure ambrosia of immortality to express his great compassion and forsake all sins.

source_sentence: 末夜今修此歎偈　　豈能周悉如法說
translation: Toward the end of the night, how can one recite these verses in such a way that they are complete?

source_sentence: 而於聖凡諸天眾　　咸願無殃罪銷滅
translation: yet he wishes that all sins of the holy ones and all the gods will be eliminated.

source_sentence: 復啟一切諸明使　　及以神通清淨眾
translation: He also inspired all the messengers of enlightenment and all the pure beings who possessed superknowledgements.

source_sentence: 各降大慈普蔭覆　　拔除我等諸愆咎
清淨光明力智惠　　慈父明子淨法風
translation: pure light, power, wisdom, benevolence, kindness, father and son, the pure dharma-wind

source_sentence: 微妙相心念思意　　夷數電明廣大心
translation: the mind of subtle characteristics, thoughts, and intentions, which are counted as lightning and a vast mind

source_sentence: 又啟真實平等王　　能戰勇健新夷數
translation: Also, he reveals the true equality of the king who can fight courageously and strengthen the number of new barbarians.

source_sentence: 雄猛自在忙儞尊　　并諸清淨光明眾
translation: the majestic, unimpeded, busy-body Buddha and his retinues of pure lights.

source_sentence: 一切善法群中相　　一切時日諸福業
translation: all the characteristics of a group of good qualities, and all the merits that are accumulated day by day

source_sentence: 普助我等加勤力　　功德速成如所願

translation: He praised the jeweled lotus flower of enlightenment, which is like a buddha-field full of light and knowledge.

source_sentence: 擢幹彌輪超世界　　根果通身並堪譽
translation: Their roots of enlightenment transcend all worlds, And their roots and fruits transcend all bodies.

source_sentence: 若人能食此果者　　即得長生不死身
translation: And whoever eats this food will attain the body of immortality.

source_sentence: 或復甞彼甘露味　　內外莊嚴令心憘
translation: Or he might taste the taste of ambrosia, adorning himself internally and externally to make his mind sweet.

source_sentence: 即是眾生倚託處　　策持令安得堅固
translation: It is the refuge of all living beings, sustaining and strengthening them.

source_sentence: 能與我等無生滅　　豈不齊心稱讚禮
珍重珍重慈父名　　究竟究竟願如是
一者明尊　　二者智惠　　三者常勝
translation: One is to explain the honored one, two are wisdom and wisdom, and three are always superior.

source_sentence: 四者歡喜　　五者勤修　　六者真實
translation: The fourth is joy. The fifth is diligent cultivation. The sixth is truth.

source_sentence: 七者信心　　八者忍辱　　九者直意
translation: The seventh is faith. The eighth is patience. The ninth is sincerity.

source_sentence: 十者功德　　十一者齊心和合
translation: The tenth is merit, and the eleventh is the unity of mind.

source_sentence: 十二者內外俱明　　莊嚴智惠
translation: 12. Both internal and external are illuminated, adorned with wisdom

source_sentence: 具足如日　　名十二時　　圓滿功德
translation: The twelve-hour period is the time of the fullness of virtue, like a sun.

source_sentence: 一者無上光明王　　二者智惠善母佛
translation: One is the Buddha King of Unsurpassed Light, and the other is the Buddha Sunetra of Wisdom and Benevolence.

source_sentence: 三者常勝先意佛　　四者歡喜五明佛
translation: The third is the Buddha of Immeasurable Joy, the foremost among all enlightened buddhas.

source_sentence: 五者勤修樂明佛　　六者真實造相佛
translation: The fifth is the Buddha who develops living beings’ aspirations, and the sixth is the Buddha who creates reality.

source_sentence: 七者信心淨風佛　　八者忍辱日光佛
translation: The seventh is the Pure Wind of Faith, and the eighth is the Sunlight of Forbearance.

source_sentence: 九者直意盧舍那　　十者知恩夷數佛
十一者齊心電光佛　　十二者惠明莊嚴佛
身是三世法中王　　開楊一切祕密事
translation: The body is the king of the teachings of the three times, revealing all esoteric matters.

source_sentence: 二宗三際性相義　　悉能顯現無疑滯
translation: the meaning of the two doctrines and three realms of nature and characteristics can all be expressed without doubt

source_sentence: 無上光明王智惠　　常勝五明元歡喜
translation: Wisdom of the King of Unexcelled Light, always superior to the five luminous ones, rejoices greatly

source_sentence: 勤心造相恒真實　　信心忍辱鎮光明
translation: the characteristics created with diligence are always true, faith and forbearance subdue their light

source_sentence: 宜意知恩成功德　　和合齊心益惠明
translation: It's appropriate to know the virtues of kindness and success, harmonize their minds, and benefit from wisdom.

source_sentence: 究竟究竟常寬泰　　稱讚稱楊四處佛
translation: The ultimate and the ultimate are always generous, praiseworthy, and called the four places of Yang Buddha

source_sentence: 宜從依梵。
translation: It's better to follow the basis of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 鳥列弗哇阿富覽　　彼驍踴使護法者
常明使眾元堪譽　　願降大慈護我等
無上貴族輝耀者　　蓋覆此處光明群
是守牧者警察者　　常能養育軟羔子
真斷事者神聖者　　遊諸世間最自在
能降黑暗諸魔類　　能滅一切諸魔法
translation: He can subdue all the demons of darkness, and he can destroy all their magical spells.

source_sentence: 進途善眾常提策　　於諸善業恒祐助
translation: He follows the ways of virtuous beings and is always involved in virtuous deeds.

source_sentence: 與聽信者加勤力　　於諸時日為伴侶
translation: He was always accompanied by those who believed in him.

source_sentence: 又復常鑒淨妙眾　　令離怨嗔濁穢法
translation: Furthermore, he should always be attentive to the purity of all living beings so that they will become free of enmity and hatred.

source_sentence: 勤加勇猛無閑暇　　令離魔王犯網毒
translation: of the absence of leisurely effort, consummated by fearlessness; freed from demons and lords of the gods, he will be a heroic hero.

source_sentence: 寥蕳一切諸明性　　自引入於清淨法
translation: It is full of all kinds of knowledge, bringing forth its own pure dharmas.

source_sentence: 訶罰惡業諸外道　　勿令損害柔和眾
translation: Do not punish the heretics for their evil deeds, and do not harm the holy ones.

source_sentence: 光明善眾加榮樂　　黑暗毒類令羞恥
translation: It shines brightly, benefiting all living beings and shameful to the dark and poisonous.

source_sentence: 下降法堂清淨處　　自榮善眾離怨敵
translation: He descends to the pure place of the Sahā universe, where he nourishes himself and keeps free of all enemies.

source_sentence: 顯現記驗為寬泰　　能除怕懼及戰慓
持孝善眾存慰愈　　通傳善信作依止
translation: He maintained filial piety and relied on the well-known Buddhist believers.

source_sentence: 滅除魔鬼雜毒焰　　其諸虛妄自然銷
translation: To extinguish the poisonous flames of demons, and naturally eliminate all their falsehoods.

source_sentence: 備辦全衣具甲伏　　利益童男及童女
translation: to gather all the cloth and armor for the sake of boys and girls;

source_sentence: 一切魔事諸辛苦　　如日盛臨銷暗影
translation: all the demonic deeds and hardships are like the rising sun that removes its dark shadow

source_sentence: 常作歡樂及寬泰　　益及一切善法所
translation: They are always happy and generous, benefiting from all good qualities.

source_sentence: 接引儭贈不辭勞　　利益觸處諸明性
translation: It is the seat of knowledge, because it does not rely on anything.

source_sentence: 歡樂寬泰加褒譽　　普及同卿光明眾
translation: He was delighted with the praise of Kōtai and extended his blessing to all those who shared your same radiance as him.

source_sentence: 唯願驍勇諸明使　　加斯大眾堅固力
自引常安泰寬處　　養育我等增福業
translation: of the great store of merit which is rooted in enlightenment, consummated by being always attentive and generous;

source_sentence: 護正法者誠堪譽　　所謂大力諸明使
translation: He who protects the true Dharma is truly honored as the messenger of great knowledge.

source_sentence: 無上光明之種族　　普於正法常利益
translation: of the family of the supreme light, always benefiting all living beings from the Teaching;

source_sentence: 如有重惱諸辛苦　　聖眾常蠲離淨法
translation: Likewise, the holy ones who are constantly tormented by suffering and oppressed by afflictions do not rely on anything pure.

source_sentence: 碎散魔界及魔女　　勿令對此真聖教
translation: Reverend Ānanda, do not confuse the realm of Māra with that of its goddesses.

source_sentence: 能除怨敵諸暗種　　安寧正法令無畏
translation: He can remove the darkness of all enemies and opponents, peacefully and fearlessly.

source_sentence: 救拔羔子離犲狼　　善男善女寧其所
translation: Good men and good women, please rescue the lamb from the wolf!

source_sentence: 芸除惡草淨良田　　常自鑒臨使增長
translation: Likewise, he does not cut down the roots of unwholesome weeds and keeps the field pure. He always looks out for his own growth.

source_sentence: 弱者策之加大力　　幖者偶之使無懼
translation: The weak are disciplined by the stronger, while the dumb have no fear when confronted.

source_sentence: 同卿真眾須求請　　如響魔應聲速來赴
一切時中策淨眾　　其樂性者常加力
translation: At all times he nourishes the living beings, who are naturally blissful.

source_sentence: 造惡業者令羞恥　　修善業者令歡喜
translation: Doing evil deeds to shame, and doing good deeds to rejoice

source_sentence: 清淨法門令寬泰　　又復常加大寧靜
translation: the pure dharma-gate of enlightenment, so that they may be generous and peaceful;

source_sentence: 我實不能具顯述　　此歎何能得周悉
translation: I really can't explain it in detail. How can this praise be fully comprehended?

source_sentence: 勇族所作皆成辦　　伎藝彌多難稱說
translation: It is difficult to describe all the arts and crafts of the heroic gods.

source_sentence: 尊者即是劫傷怒思　　其餘眷屬相助者
一切時中應稱讚　　為是究竟堪譽者
translation: It should be praised at all times for being ultimately praiseworthy.

source_sentence: 唯願令時聽我啟　　降大慈悲護我等
任巧方便自遮防　　務得安寧離怨敵
translation: He is skilled in civilizing and defending himself with skillful means, seeking peace and freedom from enemies.

source_sentence: 唯願法門速寬泰　　巍巍堂堂無障礙
translation: May the Dharma-gate of enlightenment be speedily extended, and may the majestic halls be unobstructed.

source_sentence: 我等道路重光輝　　遊行之處得無畏
translation: our paths are shining brightly, and where we walk we attain fearlessness.

source_sentence: 歡樂慕闍諸尊首　　乃至真心在法者
各加踴躍及善業　　必於諸聖獲大勝
translation: Each of them will surely attain great victory over the holy ones in terms of accumulating merit and good actions.

source_sentence: 諸明使眾恕我等　　慈父故令護我輩
無上善族大力者　　承慈父命護正法
既於明群充牧主　　所有苦難自應防
是開法者修道者　　法門所至皆相倚
護樂性者棄世榮　　並請遮護加大力
translation: He who protects the nature of bliss abandons worldly prosperity and asks to be disciplined and strengthened.

source_sentence: 柔濡羔子每勤收　　光明淨種自防被
translation: Every time the soft and gentle lamb is collected, the pure seeds of light are self-protected.

source_sentence: 法田荊棘勤科伐　　令諸苗實得滋成
translation: The field of the Law is full of thorns and thorny roots, which are planted in order to produce seedlings.

source_sentence: 既充使者馳驛者　　必須了彼大聖旨
translation: As soon as he had fulfilled his appointed duty, the messengers of the assembly must have comprehended the teachings of the holy ones.

source_sentence: 復與法體元無二　　平安護此善明群
translation: It is inherently nondual with the essence of dharmas, yet it protects all living beings.

source_sentence: 世界法門諸聖置　　專令使眾常防護
translation: The holy ones of the universe Sarvagandhasugandhā will protect all living beings.

source_sentence: 既充福德驍踴者　　實勿輕斯真聖教
translation: But, reverend Śāriputra, do not despise the holy teachings of the Buddha who is endowed with merit.

source_sentence: 頭首大將[耳*巳]俱孚　　常具甲仗摧逆黨
translation: At the head of the great general [er*si] Kaufu, he always equips himself with armor and destroys opponents.

source_sentence: 大雄淨風能救父　　勅諸言教及戒約
translation: The great heroic and pure wind can rescue their fathers, commanding words and teachings and precepts.

source_sentence: 福德勇健諸明使　　何故不勤所應事
translation: Why don't you serve the messengers of wisdom who are endowed with merit and courageous?

source_sentence: 勿懷懈怠及變異　　莫被類於犯事者
translation: Don't harbor laziness or change, and don't be like someone who commits crimes.

source_sentence: 必須如彼能牧主　　掣脫羔兒免狼虎
translation: It must be like that shepherd who pulls out a lamb and escapes wolves and tigers.

source_sentence: 彼大威聖降魔將　　是上人相常記念
元化使眾自莊嚴　　故令護法作寬泰
translation: Because the Buddha-qualities are originally transformed, beings become self-adorned; therefore, he causes them to protect the Dharma and make it his tolerance.

source_sentence: 令諸降魔伏外道　　以光明手持善眾
translation: to cause the defeat of all Māras and oppress non-Buddhists by means of light;

source_sentence: 勤加勇猛常征罰　　攻彼迷徒害法者
translation: He should be a heroic warrior, always attacking the enemy and inflicting harm on those who are lost.

source_sentence: 清淨善眾持戒人　　各願加歡及慈力
translation: May all living beings who keep the pure precepts be joyful and give rise to the power of compassion.

source_sentence: 我今略述名伎藝　　諸明使眾益法者
其有聽眾相助人　　與法齊安無障礙
translation: Those living beings who listen to these teachings will be harmonious and unhindered with the Dharma.

source_sentence: 救拔詮者破昏徒　　摧伏魔尊悅淨眾
translation: Reverend Śāriputra, you have conquered the devils of Māra and destroyed all living beings.

source_sentence: 我等常活明尊父　　隱密恒安大明處
translation: Venerable father, we are always alive and luminous. We live in the secluded place of great illumination.

source_sentence: 高於人天自在者　　不動國中儼然住
translation: He was superior to the lord of humans and gods in being unmoving, abiding peacefully in his kingdom.

source_sentence: 為自性故開惠門　　令覺生緣涅槃路
巧示我等性命海　　上方下界明暗祖
translation: He skillfully showed us the ocean of nature and life, the ancestor of light and darkness in the upper and lower realms

source_sentence: 微妙光輝內外照　　聚集詮簡善業體
translation: subtle light shining inside and out that illuminates, gathering together, explaining the essence of good actions

source_sentence: 魔王惡黨競怒嗔　　恐明降暗不自在
苦哉世間諸外道　　不能分別明宗祖
輪迴地獄受諸殃　　良為不尋真正路
告汝明群善業輩　　及能悟此五明者
常須警覺淨心田　　成就父業勿閑暇
translation: He should always be attentive to the pure field of mind, cultivating his father’s business and not indulging in leisure.

source_sentence: 分別寥簡諸性相　　及覺明力被掟縛
translation: They are bound by the power of discriminating and simplifying natures and characteristics, and by the power of enlightenment and insight.

source_sentence: 於此正法決定修　　若能如是速解脫
translation: He who is devoted to this doctrine and thus attains liberation.

source_sentence: 世界諸欲勿生貪　　莫被魔家網所著
translation: Do not be attached to worldly desires, and do not be attached to the house of Māra.

source_sentence: 堪譽惠明是法王　　能收我等離死錯
translation: Reverend Mahākātyāyana, this is the king of the Dharma who can free us from the bondage of death.

source_sentence: 照曜內外無不曉　　令我等類同諸聖
translation: He illuminates both inside and outside without fail, enabling us to be equal to the saints.

source_sentence: 恬寂仙藥與諸徒　　餌者即獲安樂[這-言+至]
translation: The herbs of the holy and peaceful sages are given to those who feed them, and they attain well-being.

source_sentence: 鍊於淨法令堪譽　　心意莊嚴五妙身
translation: He was skilled in the cultivation of virtue, his mind adorned with five subtle bodies.

source_sentence: 智惠方便教善子　　皆令具足無不真
translation: Their knowledge, wisdom, and skill in liberative technique are perfected by the bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 奇特光明大慈父　　所集善子因祖力
translation: the great compassionate father of marvelous radiance, the good sons he gathers because of the power of his ancestors

source_sentence: 搥鍾擊鼓告眾生　　明身離縛時欲至
translation: When the bell is ringing and the drum beats, he tells sentient beings that his body is free of bondage when he wants to reach it.

source_sentence: 究竟分折明暗力　　及諸善業并惡敵
translation: the ultimate refutation of the power of light and darkness, as well as good actions and bad enemies

source_sentence: 世界天地及參羅　　並由慈尊當解折
translation: The world, the heavens and earth, as well as the universe Sahā, will be liberated by the holy one Maitreya.

source_sentence: 魔族永囚於暗獄　　佛家踴躍歸明界
各復本體妙莊嚴　　串戴衣冠得常樂
translation: Each of them was originally beautiful and adorned, wearing robes and crowns to show their eternal bliss.

source_sentence: 敬歎五大光明佛　　充為惠甲堅牢院
translation: to venerate the buddha of the five great rays of light and serve as a monastery for the restraints of wisdom

source_sentence: 世界精華之妙相　　任持物類諸天地
translation: the marvelous characteristics of the world's essence are freely maintained by all kinds of heavens and earths

source_sentence: 一切含識諸身命　　一諸眼見耳聞音
translation: all the consciousnesses that contain body and life, which are seen by the eye and heard by ear

source_sentence: 能為骨節諸身力　　能為長養諸形類
translation: It nourishes all living beings by the power of their bones and limbs.

source_sentence: 復作諸舌數種言　　又作諸音數種聲
translation: They also utter words as numerous as atoms in all the buddha-fields.

source_sentence: 亦是心識廣大明　　能除黑暗諸災苦
translation: It is the seat of thought and consciousness, being free of darkness and suffering.

source_sentence: 一切仁者之智惠　　一切辦者之言辭
translation: the wisdom of all kinds of benefactors, and the words of all those engaged in religious practice

source_sentence: 能作身貇端嚴色　　能為貴勝諸福利
translation: He may follow the ways of the gods, yet his body is beautiful and well adorned.

source_sentence: 復作上性諸榮顯　　又作勇健諸伎能
translation: It is the seat of high resolve, full of energy and intelligence.

source_sentence: 是自在者威形勢　　是得寵者諸利用
一切病者之良藥　　一切競者之和顏
translation: It is the antidote for all sicknesses and the medicine for all opponents.

source_sentence: 能作萬物諸身酵　　能為依止成所辦
translation: It is the seat of all living beings and the repose of all things.

source_sentence: 復是世界榮豐稔　　又是草木種種苗
春夏騰身超世界　　每年每月充為首
translation: In the spring and summer, he surpassed the world in terms of body-surpassing bodies, rising every year at the head of the month.

source_sentence: 若有智惠福德人　　何不思惟此大力
常須護念真實言　　恒加怕懼勿輕慢
translation: He should always be mindful of his true words and not slander them.

source_sentence: 覺察五大光明佛　　緣何從父來此界
了知受苦更無過　　善巧抽拔離魔窟
translation: He knows the suffering of all living beings without exception and skillfully pulls them out of Māra’s den.

source_sentence: 是即名為有眼人　　是即名為智惠者
停罷一切諸惡業　　遂送還於本宗祖
translation: Having abandoned all evil deeds, he returned to his native land.

source_sentence: 齋戒堅持常慎護　　及以攝念恒療治
translation: He observes the rules of purity, being obedient to all living beings and disciplined with mindfulness.

source_sentence: 晝夜思惟真正法　　務在銓澄五妙身
translation: Day and night, he reflects on the true Dharma, serving in the five marvelous bodies of Śākyamuni.

source_sentence: 其有地獄輪迴者　　其有劫火及長禁
translation: As for the rebirths in hells, there are the kalpas of fire and bondage.

source_sentence: 良田不識五明身　　遂即離於安樂國
translation: But the Licchavi Vimalakīrti had no ideation of the bodies of the five superknowledges, so he left the universe Sahā.

source_sentence: 復告善業明兄弟　　用心思惟詮妙身
translation: Again, the Licchavi Vimalakīrti said to the holy brothers Sunetra and Bhārgava,

source_sentence: 各作勇健智船主　　渡此流浪他鄉子
此是明尊珍貴寶　　咸用身船般出海
勤醫被刻苦瘡疣　　久已悲哀希救護
translation: He had been suffering from painful sores and warts for a long time, and wished to be cured.

source_sentence: 請各慈悲真實受　　隨即依數疾還主
貴族流浪已多年　　速送本鄉安樂處
translation: Having been roaming for many years, the noble ones will quickly return to their native land and find peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 端正光明具相子　　早拔離於貪欲藏
translation: Likewise, the seeds of enlightenment are not born in the realm of desire.

source_sentence: 幽深苦海尋珍寶　　奔奉涅槃清淨王
translation: In the deep sea of suffering, he searches for treasures and rushes to nirvāṇa as pure king.

source_sentence: 抽拔惡刻出瘡痍　　洗濯明珠離泥溺
translation: He pulls out bad carvings and removes sores, washing bright pearls from the mud and drowning in them.

source_sentence: 法稱所受諸妙供　　莊嚴清淨還本主
translation: The reverend Dharmakṣema receives all the offerings that are appropriated by the Buddha and returns them to their original place.

source_sentence: 夷數肉血此即是　　堪有受者隨意取
如其虛妄違負心　　夷數自微無雪路
translation: Likewise, if one follows the ways of falsehood and disobedience, there will be no snowy roads or mountains.

source_sentence: 憶念戰幖命終時　　平等王前莫屈理
translation: Remember, prince of gods, when you die in battle, don't bend over backwards before the king of equanimity

source_sentence: 法相惠明餘諸佛　　為此明身常苦惱
過去諸佛羅漢等　　並為五明置妙法
今時雄猛忙儞尊　　對我等前皆顯現
translation: Reverend Mahāprajāpatīṃṣṭacāritra, the holy one who is thus engaged in such activities now manifests them before me.

source_sentence: 汝等智惠福德人　　必須了悟憐慜性
勤行醫藥防所禁　　其有苦患令瘳愈
translation: He practiced medicine to prevent the sickness of those who were oppressed by the diseases.

source_sentence: 戒行威儀恒堅固　　持齋禮拜及讚誦
translation: Their morality, their deportment, and their manner are firm; they observe fasts, venerate, and praise them.

source_sentence: 身口意業恒清淨　　歌唄法言無間歇
translation: Their physical, verbal, and mental actions are always pure, chanting the Dharma without interruption.

source_sentence: 又復真實行憐愍　　柔和忍辱淨諸根
translation: Their roots of benevolence, their roots of tolerance, their roots of virtue, and their roots of goodness are pure.

source_sentence: 此乃並是明身藥　　遂免疼悛諸苦惱
translation: These are the medicines that will protect you from pain and suffering.

source_sentence: 流浪他鄉一朝客　　既能延請令歡喜
